item.title: How I Mistook Silence for the Drug
item.author: mikeyparker@gmail.com (Mike Parker)
item.description: After years of addiction and recovery, an operation revealed something I’d been searching for my whole life — the quiet beneath the noise. How I Mistook Silence for the Drug is a meditation on stillness, survival, and the alignment that follows chaos.
